featured.text: Generally, the biggest complaint among home exchangers has to do with different standards of cleanliness.
He frequently ordered blood tests and X-rays, and repeatedly referred her to specialists for even minor complaints.
Her doctor asked her to consult other specialists due to her constant complaints.
Most physician office visits are for stress-related illnesses and complaints.

definition.zh_def: 不滿或抱怨的表達，通常針對某種不滿意的情況或服務。
definition.en_def: An expression of dissatisfaction or annoyance about something.
definition.example: She filed a complaint about the poor service at the restaurant.
